price: 5. Allons-Nous donc vous délaisser et vous priver du Rappel parce que vous êtes un peuple porté aux excès ?
arabic: أَفَنَضۡرِبُ عَنكُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَ صَفۡحًا أَن كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: afanaḍribu ʿankumu al-dhik'ra ṣafḥan an kuntum qawman mus'rifīna
